creator: trader@saltare.com
text:
If you use more than one custom CategoryFactory then an incorrect Category can 
be returned from Category.get(String, CategoryFactory).  JBoss in particular 
uses its own CategoryFactory, which makes it impossible to correctly use a 
different CategoryFactory when logging in session beans, because JBoss performs 
some logging calls for session beans, because the Category from JBoss' 
CategoryFactory is returned, not the Category from my own CategoryFactory.

The problem is that the cache of Categories in Hierarchy.java uses only the 
Category name as a cache key, instead of something like a two-level cache with 
Category name and CategoryFactory.

I can't tell is this problem is also in 1.2alpha because the source to the 
Repositories wasn't in my download.

Custom logger subclasses are a headache. The newly introduced logger repository
architecture should solve the problem.
